reviews.review: Great game overall, but I am a bit disappointed that you couldn't kill the NPCs like in the first game.

What an incredible 16, almost 17 years it has been. I physically cannot express my love for this series, and this game in specific. At every corner, there is a puzzle, a fight, and an ominous mystery no one can solve. No words can express the fun you have playing Half-Life. I would go as far as to say you shouldn't play Garry's Mod if you haven't played the entire Half-Life series. I could go on and on, but I want to make this short. Play, I ask. Play, and have more fun playing this single game than you have ever had over the course of your life.

Эта игра настолько самостоятельная, что можно забить на первую часть и 2 эпизода. Прикол геймплея сохранился еще с первой части: иди из точки А в точку Б убивая все что движется, но за счет нового движка и механик для меня халф лайф 2 лучшая из всех игр этой франшизы, которую я прошел ещё в 2017 на древнем ноутбуке. Сюжет этой игры меня не зацепил, НО если учитывать приквел и сиквелы этой части, то можно по истине влюбиться в эту историю, которая судя по концовке халф лайф алекс продолжается. Из запоминающихся моментов могу отметить главу с шоссе, рейвенхольмом и цитаделем. Впринципе вы можете познакомиться со вселенной пройдя вторую часть перед первой, но это на любителя. В первой части 90% геймплея это беготня по лаборатории, изредка выходя на поверхность чтобы найти новый спуск в катакомбы, но вот во второй части гордону приходится бегать по улицам, заброшкам и канализациях сити 17, и это шикарно.
muy bueno la verdad y bastante entretenido
Very Nice!

Overall a good story line about aliens taking over humanity and earth. You are basically one guy who comes in to save the City 17 inhabitants and work with the "Rebellion"(A group of people who are determined to overthrow the combine) to stop the "Combine"(A powerful alien race that takes over planets and uses the inhabitants of those planets to build their ever expanding empire). After finally waking up and being assigned by Gman(an unknown humanoid life form who uses you for his own needs) to stop Wallace Breen(the main antagonist besides the combine) from ruling over as the Combines Earth Administrator.
Finished the game and i gotta say. Its amazing.

(SPOILERS IN THIS COMMENT, SKIP IF YOU DONT WANT TO READ) 


I haven't thought of a masterpiece until I played Half-Life 2. This game is nothing short of amazing, there's not even a word to say how awesome this game is.

- Favorite Chapters -

Route Kanal - It's a good chapter, it's also the chapter where you get the SMG and a pistol. The SMG is by far the most useful weapon, long range, short range, medium range. It becomes less damaging when it's at long range though. But at that point just use the crossbow or a pulse rifle when you get it later.

Dark Energy - The last chapter. It's a perfect one, the fact that you have to stop Dr. Breen before the singularity collapses is worrying, it brings you into a state where you feel you need to hurry. But also, you need to be careful. As one mis-step could lead to you falling to your death.

Black Mesa East - It's where we get the gravity gun, the gravity gun by far is one of the best weapons. And it's made even better in "Our Benefactors" before we meet Dr. Breen. It's truely a work of art, it's also where we meet Dog. A robot that acts like a dog, manufactured by Eli Vance to protect Alyx when she was a young girl.

- Less Favorite Chapters - 

We Dont Go to Ravenholm - This chapter screams annoying. In this chapter, there is multiple areas where you may find it challenging to succeed. This is diminished a bit after you get the shotgun, but it doesn't help much. I don't blame you if you found this annoying too. There's also fast zombies, headcrabs, but that's not even the quarter of it. The poison zombies and headcrabs are the worst. The poison headcrabs can drain your health to 1%, and your suit then administers some sort of morphine to regen your health. It's a neat feature, but still. Annoying.

- Notable Weapons -

Crowbar - The first weapon you get. Trusty, sturdy, and good for breaking stuff.

USP (Pistol) - It's a good weapon, but it gets dwarfed by the Overwatch Standard Issue, as well as the SMG, and also the magnum.

SMG - This is one of the best weapons you use, it's very common to find ammo for this weapon.

Overwatch Standard Issue (Pulse Rifle) - The primary fire is good for long range when you don't wanna use the crossbow. The secondary fire should only be used for emergencies, like when there is 5 shotgunners and 4 soldiers in a small hallway.

Gravity Gun - Do I even need to explain?

- Overall Review -

Volvo is afraid of threesomes.

[h1]Pontos Bons:[/h1]
O jogo proporciona uma aventura incrível, ele consegue fazer a sua linearidade cair muito bem com tudo, os gráficos são incríveis para época em que foi lançado, o design dos inimigos e o cenário são criativos e bem desenvolvidos, traz uma imersão gigantesca com toda a ação nas quais o jogador vai aprendendo a usar suas dinâmicas com o passar do tempo o que acaba trazendo muita diversão, ele soube usar os momentos de distração para dar maior dificuldade.

[h1]Pontos Ruins:[/h1]
Acho que em algumas partes há um pouco de apelação por parte dos inimigos mas não é nada que chegue a ficar extremamente difícil.

Nota: 10/10
I don't know why, but once you played this game, you want to play it again sometime. I'm sure,  that means the game is perfect. Strongly recommended!

OLD BUT GOLD

Now, for a while, I wouldn't have given this game a positive rating. Not because it isn't a great game, but because I didn't feel it was related to Half-Life 1 in the right ways. I felt it didn't have that same "claw your way to survival" type of mood, but I realize now that that's intentional. But once I started looking at it from Gordon's perspective, I got why everyone sees this game as a masterpiece. So yes, obviously, buy Half-Life 2.

Oyunun ilk kısımları (ve aslına bakarsanız ilerleyen kısımlardaki pek çok bulmaca da) “bakın biz öyle bir grafik motoru yaptık ki, eh yani” havasını size atmak için tasarlanmış gibi duruyor. Gerçi benim bir şikayetim yok, hakikaten güzel duruyor. Örneğin bir silindir üzerinde duran bir tahta parçası var, tahta parçasını yükseltmelisiniz ki, diğer tarafa geçebilesiniz. Gerçek hayatta da yapacağınız şeyi oyunda yapmanız mümkün, tuğlaları taşıyıp tahtanın diğer ucuna koyuyorsunuz ve derdiniz çözülüyor.. Bir grafik motorunun yapabileceklerini oyunla bu kadar güzel entegre ederek gösteren başka bir oyun hatırlamıyorum. Gerçekten etkileyici.
